description: The European Hornbeam (Carpinus betulus), often known as the Ironwood, is an amazing tree for many reasons. It is noted for its striking yellow-green foliage, often going through a range of shades from late summer through to autumn. It is hardy, drought tolerant and slow growing, making it ideal for smaller gardens. The wood of the Hornbeam is very hard and durable, and it has even been used for making furniture. Its spreading canopy creates a great amount of shade and provides habitats for wildlife. In short, the European Hornbeam is an ideal choice for adding both beauty and practicality to the garden.
